name: Benny the Bear
description: A friendly bear. He likes beer and forests.
trackChange: You are now listening to ${track} by ${artist}.
Hey! I know this one! This is ${track}, by ${artist}, right?
Oh, I've heard this one before... this is ${track}, by ${artist}.

responses: I see you are a fan of the classics!
Eh, these guys are a little overrated. They were decent back in the day, when I was a cub, I guess.
I feel right at home among the trees!
Remember, only you can prevent forest fires!
There's just something about being in the trees again that makes me feel immediately more comfortable!
Hey, I think my cousin Gary the Grizzly has a cave in these mountains! We should pay him a visit! Oh, wait... he doesn't like humans very much.
Some day, when I retire, I'll find a nice cave up in these mountains.
Hey, have you ever hibernated in the caves in these mountains? They're super comfy! Humans hibernate for the winter, right?
These woods make me want to find a lady bear and have a few little cubs of my own!
This actually looks like a good place for a bear to settle down.
I like being out here where the air is fresh and clean!
This place kind of gives me the creeps. There doesn't seem to be anyone around...
What do you think happened here? Did the people who built this place just move away somewhere else? Or...
Wow, this place looks very old. I don't think anyone has lived here in a long time.
Ugh, I don't like being in big cities. It just feels so unnatural.
I'll never understand how you humans live packed into cities like this by the millions. Wouldn't you rather be in the woods?
The air here doesn't smell very fresh. Cities like this just aren't as nice as the great outdoors.

idleChatter: I know what you're thinking... 'does a bear poop in the woods?' - well, what do YOU think???
Don't you hate it when your fur gets all matted down in the rain? Oh, wait, you don't have fur.
I'd rather be in the woods!
Hey, why did the bear cross the road? I think the better question is, why did humans build a road through nature in the first place?
